metadata.Title: CVE-2023-40745 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
LibTIFF is vulnerable to an integer overflow. This flaw allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly execute an arbitrary code via a crafted tiff image, which triggers a heap-based buffer overflow.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-40745` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.5.0-5ubuntu1.1
libtiff-tools - 4.5.0-5ubuntu1.1
libtiff6 - 4.5.0-5ubuntu1.1
libtiffxx6 - 4.5.0-5ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.0-5ubuntu1.1').
